channel.title: Need help with server/client (connection problem)
channel.description:
I think it is a 474
I would like all coders to help me find out what is the problem that don't let me connect to my server it only lets trough localhost I tested on my friends computer and it wont let me connect to it I have portforwarded and this isn't my first server but I don't know what to do never have had this kind of problem
So what happens when I try to connect to my ip is says error connecting to server
I will post base source, client here and cache files
Server Source: [url=http://download1081.mediafire.com/qjiyodo4qdwg/df4xtj8jbra/InnovationX+No+leach.rar]http://download1081.mediafire.com/qjiyodo4qdwg/df4xtj8jbra/InnovationX+No+leach.rar[/url] Client Source: [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/IX%20Pro%20Client.rar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/IX%20Pro%20Client.rar[/url] Cache: [url=http://download849.mediafire.com/wvrss9ivcskg/g3w5knyap19vjcc/ixcache.zip]http://download849.mediafire.com/wvrss9ivcskg/g3w5knyap19vjcc/ixcache.zip[/url]
Cache goes in hard drive -> Documents and Settings -> usser -> .innovationxPVP_file_store_32
I hope you can help with this problem its not solved yet as far as I know so help me solve it I will credit you on my server when its opened
If you don't understand something post and I will tr to explain or to show

item.title: Need help with server/client (connection problem)
item.dc:creator: @bello33 bello33
item.description:
@bello33 wrote:

I have had servers b4 and I was fine with them they worked only but this one is kind of different when I run online no1 can connect but me to the localhost only please edit client or source (or both if needed) so it works and I will give away an rs account combat 60+ with about 3m or so on it

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with server/client (connection problem)
item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

If your running this on your computer check if your firewall is blocking the port your using, probably not going to work but when I started my firewall was a bitch and blocked everything so I just turned it off lol.

Or you can go to can you see me.Type the port your trying to use it will check if you have port forwarded or if the port is blocked.

If you need any help just add me on msn and i will show you in team viewer. sambob95@live.co.uk

Read full topic
